raw_text: MEURLING – ANTHONY RONALD – Gone to Rest with Jesus. Beloved son of late Banjamin & Mabel,​ loving husband of Nimmie (nee Gunasekara),​ beloved father of Meliza & Julian,​ father-in-law of Roshan Nishantha,​ treasured papa of Ranen,​ Aaron & Riley,​ loving brother of (late) Bertha,​ Clarence,​ Kingsley,​ Victor,​ Bonita (late),​ Doreen,​ Errol,​ Jennifer,​ Hyacinth,​ Christobel & Wendy. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s. Viewing from 15th October at 10.00 a.m. Cortege leaves the Restpect Home on 16th at 4.00 p.m. for burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (R.C. Section).066475
